mapper.select:
select , ,
from system1 cr inner join dept de on cr.Dept_Id=de.Dept_Id inner join systemtype sy on cr.SystemType_Id=sy.SystemType_Id where cr.TimeLiness=0
AND bo.BookName like CONCAT ('%',#{flag,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%')
